datafield.subfield: At head of title: al-Maktabah al-Baladīyah.
Vols. [1] and [5] lack general t.p.; v. [2]-[4] have cover title only. Many subject subdivisions have special title pages and pagination.

[1.] al-Taʼrīkh: al-Sīrah al-nabawīyah al-sharīfah. al-Taʼrīkh al-ʻām wa-al-ḥāṣṣ. al-Jughrāfīyā. al-Taʼrīkh al-ṭabʻīyah. 1925-26. -- [2.] al-ʻUlūm al-ʻarabīyah: ʻIlm al-taṣrīf. ʻIlm al-naḥw. ʻUlum al-balāghah. ʻIlm al-waḍʻ. ʻIlm al-lughah. ʻIlm al-ʻarūḍ wa-al-qawāfī. al-Adab. al-Muṣannafāt al-ijtimāʻīyah wa-al-iqtiṣādīyah wa-al-siyāsīyah. 1927. -- [3.] Kutub uṣūl al-sharīʻah al-Islāmīyah: al-Qurʼān al-sharīf. ʻIlm al-qirāʼāt wa-al-tajwīd wa-rasm al-maṣḥaf. ʻIlm al-tafsīr wa-mulḥaqātih. ʻIlm muṣṭalaḥ al-ḥadīth. ʻIlm al-ḥadīth al-sharīf. Kutub furūʻ al-sharīʻah al-Islāmīyah: ʻIlm uṣūl al-fiqh. al-Madhāhib al-arbaʻah. ʻIlm al-farāʼiḍ. 1927. -- [4.] al-Ilāhiyāt wa-mā yandaraj taḥtahā: al-Tawḥīd. al-Taṣawwuf. al-Fawāʼid wa-al-ādamīyah. al-Ḥurūf wa-al-asmāʼ. al-Farq al-Islāmīyah. al-Adyān. al-Muʻtaqadāt. al-Falsafīyāt wa-mā yajrī majrāhā: al-Manṭiq. al-Ḥikmah wa-al-falsafah. al-Mawāʼiẓ wa-al-akhlāq. Ādāb al-baḥth wa-al-manāẓirah. al-Tarbīyah wa-al-taʻlīm. 1928. -- [5.] al-Ṭabīʻīyāt wa-mā yajrī majrāhā, wa-hiya: al-Ṭibb bi-furūʻih. al-Kīmīyā wa-al-ṭabīʻah. al-Zirāʻah. al-Riyāḍīyāt wa-mā bi-tabaʻihā. al-Qawānīn wa-al-sharāʼiʻ. Aʻmāl al-ḥukūmah al-Miṣrīyah. 1928. -- [6.] al-Funūn al-munawwaʻah. al-Qiṣaṣ wa-al-riwāyāt.
